_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries "territory" is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, sinister, sombre, can insist on "crush"

text.value: Conquering Arrakis will mean fighting for the smallest patch of land, the tiniest grain of sand, the slightest mote of dust. Any stretch of territory counts when you must corner the enemy and crush them.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries squeeze is a specific book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, sinister on the first sentence, can be a bit onctuous on the last sentence (we could hear that the Baron and Piter share a common cruelty)

text.value: Without House Harkonnen to squeeze them, the villages of Arrakis are purposeless. Only you, Baron, know best how to profit from this planet.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries militia is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious but he is also mocking the Baron (maybe  smiling a bit). Last sentence: cruel, calm, like a predator

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: a bit despising, confident, arrogant

text.value: No doubt, those wretched clod villages will be dazzled by the sheer splendor of our House. I have a feeling that once subdued, they will come to rely on our blessings.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, calm, focused

text.value: I fear we will need to resort to violence to subdue the villages of Arrakis. Considering the locals lived under the Harkonnens' yoke for decades, they'll greatly distrust any foreign House.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: despising and determined (about to invade innocent villages to find manpower)

text.value: Our people can't harness the resources of Arrakis as well as the locals would. We need a workforce, which is qualified and accustomed to this wretched climate – the laborers of these villages will suffice.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat "your enemies" is neutral and do not refer to anyone specific
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: determined, serious

text.value: The more territory you hold, the more you deprive your enemies of resources. No House, however powerful, can rely solely on outside support. We'll need to seize as much land as possible from the enemy.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat "territory" is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: determined, serious, convinced that this territory would be helpful

text.value: My lord, this territory is of strategic importance in the conquest of Arrakis. We can use its resources to sustain the troops' efforts. We must make the most of the smallest patch of land.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat territory is a specitif game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: determined, serious

text.value: Based on the scouts' reports, this territory could serve as a rear base for our troops. Securing our progress on Arrakis is crucial. We must capture it.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring folk of pan and graben is a specific book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: factual, neutral, polite and serious. We can feel that Fenring is despising toward the Harkonnen.

text.value: The Harkonnens oppressed the folk of pan and graben when they held Arrakis. By comparison, any other ruling power would seem preferable to them. Once we control their villages, they will follow you out of fear of falling into the hands of a House crueler than yours.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically says "Majesty", not "Your Majesty" territory is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: factual, neutral, polite and serious. Killing villagers is not important.

text.value: Majesty, this territory is dotted with villages, which will be quick to challenge your authority. My advice is to deploy your troops there before they fall under your rivals' influence.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically says "Majesty", not "Your Majesty" territory is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: factual, neutral, polite and serious.

text.value: This territory is equally rich in manpower and resources. Occupying these villages should stabilize our supply lines in the continuing conquest of Arrakis. This was a wise choice on your part.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm but firm

text.value: You cannot let this territory be seized by any other House than our own. Our army needs these resources – the spaceships cannot supply us forever.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm and then, more and more confident and gentle (she is speaking to her dear husband). She clearly believes what she is saying

text.value: These villages will not welcome us with open arms. All they know of the Imperium is the Harkonnens’ domination. But when they see the care with which you treat your people, they will rally your cause. Have no fear, my love – I know you will garner their loyalty.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm and determined, maybe smiling at the end of the sentence.

text.value: Don’t let the hostility of the people of Arrakis wear you down. They’ll fight back against our drones, to be sure, but once their villages are ours, they will benefit from the finest in Ixian technology. And once they’re used to all the advantages House Vernius offers, they’ll wonder how they ever lived without us.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, calm, maybe jalous or defiant when talking about the Great Houses.

text.value: These villages have never been a great source of revenue, but our contacts there are invaluable. Without a support base, the Smugglers won't be able to develop their operations enough to compete with the Great Houses.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: despising and casual, upset/bored: fighting against those Great House is not a big deal

text.value: It seems that one of your opponents has their eye on these villages and the nearby resources. Ah! It reminds me of the Harkonnens' rule over Arrakis. Why must these outsiders make trade so complicated?

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: upset than the foreign people thread to wipe out their hard work. Then, very determined, ready to fight

text.value: We put in decades of effort to establish contacts in every village in this territory, and these outsiders are about to wipe it all out. We must stay in control, Father, or the Smugglers won't amount to more than a bunch of flea-bitten market vendors. Our family deserves better !

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar folk of pan and graben is a book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: deadly serious, concerned

text.value: The folk of the pan and graben will not withstand the offworlders' assault for long. If their villages fall, their numbers will strengthen our enemies. We must help them before that happens.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar  folk of pan and graben is a book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: a bit sad/regretful the city men are not true fremen. Serious

text.value: We cannot rely on the men of the cities, sister. They have Fremen blood, but they have forgotten how to live in the desert. In their time, they submitted to the Harkonnens. If we don't support them now, the folk of the pan and graben will once again serve the offworlders' ambitions.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: alerting Liet, then upset, aggressive and determined Cielagos : Furry bats of Arrakis trained for communication by the Fremen.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries territory is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: a bit amused at first, even dreamy or lyrical Then, serious and determined, even a bit onctuous

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries territory is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: surprised, despising, amused

text.value: Why is your heart set on this territory, Baron? It's as dusty and dry as the others. Do you intend to use it as a rear base? As a bridge to more appealing land? Or is it the resources described in the latest reports?

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries territory is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious and neutral, then a bit ironic, taunting the Baron

text.value: According to our spies, your enemies have already taken up position in this territory. We've also detected a few Fremen and some resources, which would aid your progress. Needless to say, every territory counts towards conquering Arrakis. As you well know.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz territory is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, determined

text.value: I regret to inform you we're not alone in eyeing this territory. Our scouts have spotted enemy installations, which will deploy if we let them. You must thwart them, Mother.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz filmbooks is a specific book term territory is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: thinking, calm

text.value: I find a certain beauty in this territory. These deserts aren't as dull as the filmbooks suggested. I bet it will inspire many artists when our House takes it.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz territory is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm, determined

text.value: This territory seems ideal for our expansion, Mother. Beneath all that sand are the resources we need to continue our conquest of Arrakis and drive out our rivals.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat territory is a specific game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, determined

text.value: None of your rivals have captured this territory, but our agents say they've taken up position there. We must ensure that the locals submit to the Atreides' authority rather than your enemies'.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, determined, respectful

text.value: Judging by the information taken from the Harkonnens, this territory contains more resources than meets the eye. The same reports also mention a number of villages, which might cause trouble. Should we try to placate them through diplomatic means?

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat Spacing Guild is a specific book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: factual, serious then determined

text.value: I reviewed the reports the Harkonnens sent to the Spacing Guild before they left. They reveal that this territory was harvested up to the last minute – we should find resources there that would prove valuable in the conquest of Arrakis.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm and respectful

text.value: None of the Great Houses have yet claimed this territory, but it won't be long now. Our scouts report that your rivals have set up outposts there. They need to be shown the superiority of the Empire.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: facual at first then thinking then doubting or defiant twoard Kynes

text.value: Reports prepared by Kynes described this territory as arid and of little use. Recent expeditions, however, indicate the presence of many deposits. I wonder what kind of game your planetologist was playing…

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm, serious

text.value: Your enemies' presence in this territory points to its strategic importance. The Empire can ill afford to backtrack in the face of the Great Houses of the Landsraad – you have no choice but to capture these lands.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: confident

text.value: With this territory’s resources, we can establish our dominance over Arrakis and support our army. Your rivals will soon be forced to give up and accept defeat.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm as she was reading a report, then determined and firm on the last sentence

text.value: The analytic machines have selected this territory as among the most strategic to our goals. Its location, its resources, its villages… everything about these lands makes them a perfect fit for our needs. We must not let them fall into our enemies’ hands.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: determined and confident. She is not angry about their enemies, she knows that her husband can defeat them.

text.value: Your enemies already have a foothold in this territory, but no matter. You will have no trouble conquering it before them. No one knows how to exploit Arrakis more effectively than we do. With the technology of House Vernius at our disposal, our victory is assured.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: despising

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: determined

text.value: The Smugglers must increase their influence if they hope to compete with the Great Houses. We must tighten our grip on Arrakis! This territory's resources would give us a head start.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm and serious, trying to appear more obedient and mature than he is.

text.value: I have learned from your instruction, Father. I am well aware that corruption is an expensive enterprise, in terms of both men and solari, which is why I recommend that you seize this territory. We could use its resources to recruit new spies and add to the bribes we can offer.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, then determined and solemn

text.value: The offworlders hope to find here the resources they need to conquer Dune. Their ‘thopters are already searching the desert for the slightest trace of spice. The Fremen must not let them advance any further.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm, teaching Liet

text.value: The more territories your enemies have, the harder it will be to stop them. Take care that they don't seize this one, for its resources are rich and its villages prosperous.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious

text.value: The tribes must be able to move about freely. When forced to avoid your enemies' territories, our warriors waste time and water. This one must not fall into their hands.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries CHOAM is a book and game term shares is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: a bit surprise, as if he was reading a new report. More deep, serious even Machiavellian/scheming on the last sentence

text.value: Your conquest of Arrakis could be more profitable than we think. If the reports on this territory are accurate, it could allow you to invest in the CHOAM. The influence to be garnered by House Harkonnen would be most valuable.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries CHOAM is a book and game term shares is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: casual on the first sentence, then smiling, amused.

text.value: As expected, the spice war is destabilizing the CHOAM. It would be a shame not to take advantage of this, Baron. Buying shares at a low cost would strengthen House Harkonnen's influence in the Imperium.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz CHOAM is a book and game term shares is a game term directorship is a book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: amused, casual. Then serious, arrogant

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz CHOAM is a book and game term shares is a game term House minor is a book and game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: despising, amused then determined and motivated on the last sentence.

text.value: The entertainment offered by our conquest is not to everyone's liking – the Houses Minor seemed especially ill at ease. According to our contacts at the CHOAM, they're desperate to get rid of their shares. Let's seize the opportunity to buy them at a good price.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat CHOAM is a book and game term shares is a game term House minor is a book and game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, factual, even a bit concerned. Then serious and determined

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat CHOAM is a book and game term shares is a game term House minor is a book and game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: concerned, worried then serious and determined

text.value: The CHOAM's status is worrisome, sire, but I also see an opportunity. Were you to buy enough shares, your enemies would be less inclined to attack you. They wouldn't be able to sell their spice without your consent.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring CHOAM is a book and game term solari is a book and game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: concerned, factual

text.value: The CHOAM is struggling. Should the organization collapse, your Empire's balance will be threatened. Majesty, we have no choice but to support it. The flow of Solaris from your end will reassure the merchants that your conquest of Arrakis is proceeding smoothly.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring CHOAM is a book and game term  House minor is a book and game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: concerned, factual

text.value: The Houses Minor are in a panic. They're all trying to sell their shares in the CHOAM en masse. The shares must be bought – it's the only way to reassure the market in the Imperium that your conquest is going well. If it collapses, Arrakis would be the last of your worries.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: she can be a bit upset, as if the behavior of the House Minor was irrationnel but then, she appears confident and more and more casual.

text.value: The Houses Minor seem to believe that the spice war will destroy the CHOAM. We must prove them wrong! Let us buy their shares with the resources acquired on Arrakis. Their fears will be swept aside, and your rivals will be put on notice.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: at first, she is thinking, almost smiling (as if she has predicted Minor Houses' behavior). Then soft and gentle but determined (she has found the solution and just waits to apply it).

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: neutral, telling a story, then serious when saying "he is not the only one". Casual (even smiling?) on the last sentence

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, explaining

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: thinking at first, as if he was reading a report. Then, hesistate on the word "share". A bit puzzled (or overwhelmed) on the last two sentences

text.value: Our contacts amongst the smugglers are in a panic. They say it's related to something those thieves call CHOAM. Some have mentioned buying shares. Great gods! Have you any idea what they mean?

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: fatalistic, resigned.

text.value: The Guild and CHOAM, the Great Houses and the Faufreluches, all these things the offworlders are obsessed with… You understand them better than we do, Liet. If these shares can help the tribes liberate Dune, then the Fremen must acquire some.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: tired, sad

text.value: I have alarming news, my lord. Our spies confirm that the enemy attack is imminent, and our reinforcements are nowhere to be seen. We'll have to hold out as long as we can, and hope that your men will get here in time to save us.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Hasimir specifically say "Majesty" and not "Your majesty" here "the enemy" is masculine
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: determined, serious, then more factual, as he was planning something

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: determined, firm when she says "But we will prevail"

text.value: The enemy is upon us. His troops have reached our border, and their numbers are impressive. But we will prevail. Our defenses are strong, and we are prepared to protect our villages. They will not fall. Our reinforcements will have time to reach us.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: determined, firm when she says "But we will prevail"

text.value: The enemy is upon us. Her troops have reached our borders, and their numbers are impressive. But we will prevail. Our defenses are solid, and we are prepared to protect our villages. They will not fall. Our reinforcements will have time to reach us.

text.value: Once again, the reports sent by the Harkonnens for years were false. The Fremen in this territory number higher than in all the Baron's estimates! His lack of interest in the desert people puts us in a delicate position, Majesty. It would behoove us to approach the Fremen sietches and negotiate with this people. We need to assess their threat level.

_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: preoccupied, thinking, as she was reading a report. Then she is intrigued

text.value: Look out, sister! The Iduali are trying to flee! None of them must pass! Our Fremen must hold their position!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is an unnamed Reverand Mother of the Bene Gesserit Bene Gesserit is a book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: neutral, calm. Maybe a bit more violent or sombre or sinister on the last sentence.

text.value: The Bene Gesserit know you are eyeing this territory and are willing to help you get it. We ask for only one thing in exchange: its supervisor's death.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is an unnamed Reverand Mother of the Bene Gesserit Bene Gesserit is a book term agent is a game term

text.value: Father, the speed at which this Great House has spread across Arrakis is alarming. It is high time we put a damper on their ambitions. I fear that if we do not react now, we will soon be forced to submit to their laws.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm and determined

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: upset, furious then determined and fierce

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is an unnamed representant of the Spacing Guild Renegade and Renegade houses are a game and book term Tupile is a book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: very formal and professional, no emotion, this is a report Context: Tupile is a planet where the defeated houses can live in peace, excluded from the Imperium.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is an unnamed representant of the Spacing Guild Spacing Guild is a book term Renegade and Renegade houses are a game and book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: very formal and professional, no emotion, this is a report Context: Tupile is a planet where the defeated houses can live in peace, excluded from the Imperium.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries territory is a game term Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: satisfied, more and more serious

text.value: Your conquest is proceeding apace, Baron. Each territory you acquire strengthens the Harkonnens and weakens your enemies. Soon all Arrakis will be yours.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: pleased, almost a complicity between him and the Baron

text.value: A most definitive victory. No one crushes their enemies like you do.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: despising toward the enemy, satisfied, mocking or cruel on the last sentence

text.value: Who would dare challenge such a victory, Baron? Your enemies fought so hard... Their disappointment must be cruel indeed!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries territory is a game term Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: formal and satisified at first. Serious on the last sentence

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries territory is a game term Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: casual, amused, even mocking the Baron

text.value: How satisfying to see you triumph over your enemies... This territory is yours, Baron, for better and for worse.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: very proud of the player (her Mother), enthusiastic (but noble)

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: proud and pleased

text.value: The enemy is retreating before our advancing army. This territory is yours!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: eager, determined, enthusiastic

text.value: Our conquest of Arrakis is progressing admirably, Mother. Soon, all the spice in the Imperium will be in our hands.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: proud of the player (her Mother)

text.value: You’re becoming quite the muse, Mother. This victory will be the subject of many a masterful work.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious and proud of the player, rewarding on the last sentence

text.value: Our banner flies over all the villages in this territory. This is a great victory, my lord.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious and proud of the player

text.value: Your men are proud to have been part of your victory. You have made these hostile lands into a new home for the Atreides.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: reporting the situation, proud of the player

text.value: This territory is yours, sire! The enemy is withdrawing! House Atreides is triumphant!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious and proud of the player, rewarding on the last sentence

text.value: Your conquest is progressing more quickly than we had hoped, my lord. It is an honor to serve at your side.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: satisfied, smiling, complicity with the duke

text.value: A victory worthy to be immortalized in song by Gurney Halleck.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: reporting the situation, serious, calm

text.value: This territory belongs to you. Your enemies have fled.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically say "Majesty", not "your majesty" territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious and calm

text.value: Majesty, this territory is yours.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: formal, serious and calm but also pleased

text.value: The Empire’s conquest of Arrakis is proceeding in line with our projections. I believe congratulations are in order.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically say "Majesty", not "your majesty" territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious and calm

text.value: This territory’s resources are ours, Majesty. The villages will exploit them in accordance with your wishes.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: smiling, very proud of her husband

text.value: I never doubted your victory, my husband. I knew that this territory would belong to House Vernius.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: proud of her husband, determined

text.value: Our House’s grip on Arrakis grows stronger with each territory we conquer. Soon the entire planet will be yours, my Earl.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: very proud of her husband

text.value: You are victorious! I couldn’t be prouder of you, my husband.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: satisfied, proud

text.value: How satisfying to see our plans for Arrakis coming to fruition! Your triumphs bring us closer to victory every day.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: relieved, proud of Liet, happy

text.value: The territory is free, sister! The offworlders are leaving! They're retreating!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: grateful, proud of his friend (not his true sister)

text.value: Your victory lifts our hearts on wings of pride, sister. Listen as the sietches sing your name!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar  "Old Father Sun" is a quote from the book
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: happy, celebrating

text.value: May Old Father Sun bear witness to your success! May all of Dune celebrate your victory!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar naib is a fremen term from the book
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: happy, enthusiastic

text.value: These lands are free! The Fremen are victorious! Soon we shall be the new naibs of Dune!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: proud of his father, cannot believe his eye

text.value: You are triumphant, Father! Victory is ours! No one can deny our dominance over this territory.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: too proud, happy

text.value: Ah! Your enemy is retreating! A Great House flees before the Smugglers!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: proud, determined

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: proud, happy, determined

text.value: A few more victories like this one, and our family will be as powerful as any Great House. We'll soon be pulling the strings of the whole Empire!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries territory is a game term Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: amused, mocking the player (Baron), taunting

text.value: What happened, Baron? It seems this territory has gotten away from you!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries territory is a game term Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: amused, mocking the player (Baron), taunting

text.value: Perhaps you underestimated your enemies, Baron? They didn’t seem to have too much trouble driving you out of this territory.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries territory is a game term Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: casual

text.value: I’ve already ordered the retreat, Baron. This territory is no great loss, though. You should concentrate on more strategic regions.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: worried, sombre

text.value: This defeat is a disturbing sign for your plans of conquest, Baron. Each enemy victory weakens you and strengthens them.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, worried

text.value: We must retreat, Mother. This territory is lost.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: arrogant but worried

text.value: Yes, we’ve lost a territory, but no matter. We’ll conquer a new one soon enough.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: arrogant, proud and determined

text.value: Only the weak are ground down by defeat, and your men are anything but. They’ll fight even more fiercely next time and conquer a new territory for you.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: determined

text.value: This defeat will teach us to be cautious, but we need not abandon our efforts. The conquest of Arrakis is still possible.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: furious

text.value: Witch blood! This territory has slipped from our grasp! We must withdraw!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: disappointed, sad, reporting the situation

text.value: We must retreat, my lord. This territory is now in enemy hands. There is nothing more we can do.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: fierce and determined

text.value: The enemy has won the day, but we shall return stronger than ever. The conquest is far from over.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: fierce and determined

text.value: My lord, this territory is lost, but the planet is vast. We can still conquer it.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically say "Majesty", not "your majesty" territory is a game term Quote from the book: "Listening to the man gave Feyd-Rautha the feeling his head was being pushed through mush". Count Fenring may use this strange sounds to annoy his opponent. In English there are translated this way : "When you're mm-m-m ironic, that ah-h-h suggests you're hm-m-m-m thinking deep thoughts" "Um-m-m-m-m-ah-h-h-hm-m-m, you come upon such, mm-m-m, preciseness so rarely," the Count said, addressing the Baron's shoulder. "I . . . ah, congratulate you on the hm-m-m perfection of your ah-h-h heir. In the light of the hm-m-m elder, one might say."
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: disappointed

text.value: Forgive my bitterness, Majesty, but seeing this territory fall into enemy hands is... hmm-m-m... deeply disappointing.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically say "Majesty", not "your majesty" territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone mortified, sorry

text.value: This never should have happened, Majesty. I offer my most profound apologies. This territory is lost to us.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically say "Majesty", not "your majesty" territory is a game term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: formal, serious but also a bit sinister has if he was lying

text.value: We mustn’t waste time regretting the loss of this territory, Majesty. The conquest of Arrakis must continue.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm, serious

text.value: Let your enemies savor this victory. It shall be their last.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: upset, angry

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: gentle as she was comforting her husband

text.value: Despite this defeat, you must not lose sight of your broader goal of conquering Arrakis. Don't lose heart – you can still crush any enemy.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: gentle as she was comforting her husband

text.value: Our will shall not be broken by the loss of a single territory. We have great plans for this planet and for House Vernius. No temporary defeat will stop us.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: despising toward her ennemies, then determined and fierce

text.value: Let your enemies rejoice today, my love. We shall have our revenge. We will come back even stronger and more determined to drive them from Arrakis.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: bitter, upset, frustrated (could sound like a small child)

text.value: We lacked ambition, Father! This territory should have been ours!

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: astonished, cannot believe his eye, a bit scared, does not understand

text.value: Impossible! How could those outsiders have pushed us back? Where did we go wrong?

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: disappointed, bitter, dark

text.value: I have given the order to retreat. You can rely on the men to avoid capture, but everything we have built in this territory is lost.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: trying to look mature and wise but sad and disappointed

text.value: Perhaps we will regain this territory one day. I shall strive to maintain the patience you have taught me.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: resigned, sad

text.value: This territory is in our enemies' hands. The sietches are no more. As Shai-Hulud has chosen.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar  "the taste of it sours us" is a quote from the book
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: resigned, sad

text.value: The taste of this defeat sours us, sister. We have failed to liberate these lands from your enemies.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar  "La la la" is a fremen cry of grief, from the book
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: trying to not look too sad, then determined "La la la" is a fremen cry of grief, from the book

text.value: La la la… Let us not spill water for the dead, sister. Our friends shall be avenged.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: calm, serious, then determined

text.value: The surviving tribes are fleeing in our direction. Promise them worthy vengeance, and they will forgive you for the loss of their sietch.

_attrs.translation_notes: The Speaker is Stilgar Iduali is a book term, invariable in english but it might vary per language. It is an insult in the fremen language meaning "Water Insect" that is exclusively used againt the Cast Out fremen present in Children of Dune Accursed Sietch is the in-game name of the sietch in this battle, please use the same name in this text as for the AccursedSietch structure
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: concerned, dark. This is not a victory

text.value: The Accursed Sietch is no more, but the Iduali are still swarming about. How long will it be until these parasites regroup to attack our tribes? None of the Fremen will sleep soundly tonight.

_attrs.translation_notes: The Speaker is Stilgar Iduali is a book term, invariable in english but it might vary per language. It is an insult in the fremen language meaning "Water Insect" that is exclusively used againt the Cast Out fremen present in Children of Dune Accursed Sietch is the in-game name of the sietch in this battle, please use the same name in this text as for the AccursedSietch structure
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: very proud of his sister, relieved

text.value: We have finished what my great-great-grandfather and his brethren began. The Accursed Sietch is no more, and the Iduali will never be a threat to the Fremen again. You have succeeded, sister.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, reporting the situation. Formal at first then more and more hopeful

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries CHOAM is a game and book term Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: thinking, dreaming. Smiling, cruel, maybe taunting on the last sentence

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically say "Majesty", not "your majesty" The Guild is a book term (Spacing Guild) Sardaukar is a book term (Sardaukar is invariable in english but it might vary by language)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: formal, serious, respectful. A bit worried on the last part, preoccupied or even doubting

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: arrogant, confident

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious and calm, as she was reading a report. When she starts talking about their technology she becomes more and more confident and proud. On the last sentence she is gently pushing her husband (who tends to avoid action)

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: at first, very calm, even neutral, as he was watching the scene from a long distance. Then grinning, smilling, arrogant, enthusiastic

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious then, from "They have no idea..." to the end, much more serious and determined, fierce.

text.value: The offworlders have come in great numbers to bring war to Dune. They carry different banners and expect to fight one another for control of the spice. They have no idea that we're already here. We, the free people. The men of the desert. The Fremen.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen) here "the enemy" is neutral (it's a general enemy, not a specific person)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, sinister, disappointed

text.value: Arrakis has slipped from your grasp once again, Baron, and this time there will be no second chance. The enemy has control of the spice. We have nothing else to hope for on this planet.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Piter de Vries Baron is a book term (Baron Vladimir Harkonnen) Giedi Prime is a book term (planet Giedi Prime)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: serious, taunting carefully. Can have a break between "hands" and "your only option".

text.value: It seems Arrakis has escaped your control, Baron. And this time, you won’t have a second chance. The spice has fallen irreversibly into the enemy’s hands. Your only option now is to withdraw to Giedi Prime, and to hope that your rival doesn’t send their legions to your world in reprisal.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Sanya Ecaz Spacing Guild is a book term
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: first sentence: serious and formal, then, a bit more familiar, sad for her mother

text.value: I have ordered our legions to withdraw from Arrakis. The Spacing Guild is ready to bring us back to Ecaz. I am sorry that your efforts on Arrakis have ended in defeat, but you have fought well, Mother. You have proven yourself worthy of our House.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Thufir Hawat here "your enemy" is neutral (it's a general enemy, not a specific person)
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: sad, disappoined, but serious and hurrying

text.value: We must abandon Arrakis, my lord. Your enemy’s conquest of the planet has progressed too far. Let us leave now, while some of our men can still be saved.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically say "Majesty", not "your majesty" here the enemy is masculine
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: formal, calm, but more an more worried

text.value: Arrakis is lost, Majesty. The enemy’s grip on this world will soon be complete. To fight on would only waste your men’s lives, at a time when you must save your strength to confront the upheaval this defeat will unleash within the Imperium.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Hasimir Fenring Fenring specifically say "Majesty", not "your majesty" here the enemy is feminine
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: formal, calm, but more an more worried

text.value: Arrakis is lost, Majesty. The enemy’s grip on this world will soon be complete. To fight on would only waste your men’s lives, at a time when you must save your strength to confront the upheaval this defeat will unleash within the Imperium.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: she is sad but tries to comfort her husband

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: sad, resigned to die, desperate and fatalistic

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: fear for his life, pressing his father to live, trying to not panic

text.value: Majesty, I'm honored to report that Arrakis is yours. Nobody will be able to oppose you ever again.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Tessia Vernius
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: satisfied, pleased, smiling.

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Staban
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: triumphant, arrogant, proud and happy

_attrs.translation_notes: Speaker is Stilgar
_attrs.voice_notes: Tone: relieved, grateful, screaming at first (as if he was watching the ships leaving) and talking directly to Liet : proud, moved, happy
